about_the_game:
Axis & Allies are at it again,  attacking and defending in alternate rounds throughout alternate worlds of pure altercation.  Yes,  it's the classic struggle of Wicked vs. Evil in this electrifying conclusion to the infinite war of the monster armies.       "This ain't yo pappy's battlefield!"™ 


1-14 players   13 highly-diverse monster classes  27 weapons   no-lag hit detection fire-from-the-barrel mechanics  hot, structured chaos  and tight, tight, tight controls!


Team Deathmatch (Hardcore)    Deathmatch (HC)    Team Chaos (HC)    Chaos (HC)

Mission

Rally your troops to victory in this ultimate showdown of monsterkind's finest!


Across the field, the line of scrimmage drives unstoppable action into the end zone.  Midnight fills the atomic sky, distorting space-time, drawing out seconds to eternity.

Carry out your objective, tactical or reckless, but stay cool and remain standing for true dominion over the Monsterfield™.


                         MONSTERGEDDON 42:  Monsters of the Eternal World War™

Mechanics

Lovingly crafted over five years, from years and years of experience, an intuitive and advanced control system delivers smooth and organic motion.  Sprint, jump, spin, glide, dodge, retreat, tilt, lean, aim, focus, and fire -- skills you'll need to reign supreme.

Gunplay

If your aim is true...  All non-projectile weapons are hitscan from the party end.  If you missed the shot, we hate to break it to ya.


Track tracers as you bang from the hip.  Line up the sights and focus in before you pull... Breathe.

Get a grip on realistic recoil patterns, not random camera deviance brought to you by the other guys.  Achieving true gun deviation requires true gun-space position;  henceforth, monsters and weapons networked separately.

Networking

Spawn into a server or spark one up.  Tickrates are high.  Drop in and drop out.

Status

Half a decade in development,  MONSTERGEDDON 42:  Monsters of the Eternal World War™ is an extended remix of the multiplayer-FPS experience.


Carefully-curated content has been crammed in everywhere to maintain a respectable level of absurdity throughout your stay.

Largely complete and what remains: more & more maps, optimizations, bugs, and tweaking.  Balance and rules are thoroughly deconstructed and rapidly revised to create the best monster-on-monster, sporting conflict.

We now dutifully submit this miscreation to you, the monster public.

... a whole lot of fantasy violence and a whole lot of real love.

So sally forth to the Monsterfront™, do your absolute worst, and have a great time!  An ever-expanding theatre of madness awaits.


We've got official  MONSTERGEDDON 42: Monsters of the Eternal World War™  merchandise!

to enlist and show your love and support.  We need your halp!

content_descriptors.notes: Contains fantasy violence and colorful blood.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Modern graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Join your monster brethren and sistren in psychedelic warfare across historically-inaccurate battlefields of glorious mayhem!﻿    The definitive WWII, apocalyptic, multiplayer, monster FPS.    Fake War, Make Love™
